==== Notes ====
* : Sound is sometimes garbled after resume. Transient. <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/linux-meta/+bug/37714|37714]]</nowiki>

* *: Only file transfer via bluetooth has been tested [works]. No mice/keyboards tested.

* **: Numpad numbers work as directional keys. [In breezy as numbers] <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/37719|37719]]</nowiki>
